section.p: Here is an overview of all Wicket related news items posted on our front page .

subsection.name: January 4, 2006 - DojoAutoUpdateHandler, try it now!
subsection.p: We have just finished our latest component. It is an Ajax auto update handler. Since it uses Wicket's beta functionality to render a singel component, you can currently only use it with the HEAD version of Wicket. You can find the components when you checkout wicket-contrib-dojo from CVS. We've included a tutorial in our tutorial section which should get you started right away!

subsection.name: November 25, 2005 - Contrib-dojo v0.3 released!
subsection.p:
We are proud to announce that version 0.3 of our library has been released. It now contains actual useable components. ;)
Fully customizable Tooltip Component (non-dojo)
DojoFX Component decorators
FXFeedbackIndicator component (non-dojo)
FXValidationAjaxHandler
Check-out our tutorial section or our Tutorials or our javadoc section for more info on the components.
